Graded Browser Support
======================

.. list-table::
   :widths: 10 10 10
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Browser
     - Version
     - Grade
   * - Chrome
     - Lastest stable
     - A-grade
   * - Firefox
     - Lastest stable
     - A-grade
   * - IE
     - 10
     - C-grade
   * - IE
     - 9
     - C-grade
   * - IE
     - 8
     - C-grade
